description: Try our easy to follow Cardamom & Pistachio Bread & Butter Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cardamom & Pistachio Bread & Butter Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a fine sieve with a double layer of muslin or clean CHUX cloth and place over a large bowl. Place yoghurt into sieve, cover and chill overnight to drain.

Place 1/4 cup cream, 1/4 cup honey, half the saffron and spices in a small saucepan over mediumhigh heat and bring to the boil. Remove from heat and stir in remaining cream, milk and egg. Add bread and butter and stir to combine. Transfer to a greased 8-cup capacity ovenproof dish. Cover and chill overnight.
Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Bake pudding for 6065 minutes or until golden and slightly firm on top.

Meanwhile, combine sultanas, remaining honey, saffron, extra cardamom and 1/3 cup boiling water in a saucepan. Stand for 10 minutes for flavours to infuse. Bring to the boil over high heat and boil for 2 minutes to reduce slightly.
Spoon syrup over pudding, top with pistachios and serve with yoghurt.
